Summary: Series of lights, merged together, changed direction
divs: sighting detailsat the beginning of october, we were driving east down oak ridge turnpike in oak ridge, tn and noticed three bright lights in the sky. they were in a diagonal line flying east along the same path we were on. we pulled the truck over to watch them - we watched the lights merge together into one larger light and then turn an immediate right (south, southeastern). we searched online to see if we could find anyone else with a similar sighting in the area around the same time and came across a video someone posted on youtube just recently that is nearly identical to what we saw. i am including the link to the video that is the same as what we saw ( it was recorded in the exact same area they were also going in the same direction. ( http:\\youtu.be\o2hanb7juoo )
trends: There have been 7 other sightings in Oak Ridge
There were no other sightings in Oak Ridge on or around October 2nd 2012
